summary: Elizabeth J. Palmer was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in payroll and certification reports from April 1978 to December 1978. These documents provide her name, and potentially her salary, though the specific details of her role within the committee are not specified in these documents.
significance: Elizabeth J. Palmer's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though the extent and nature of her contribution are not detailed in these documents.
